start.title: Daikin equipment settings
start.intro: Enter your heat pump its IP-address (airco and Homey must be in the same subnet), give it a name and choose which 'special modes' you like to control. Notes: 1/ not all 'special modes' might be supported by your particular heat pump model. 2/ the use of a static IP-address is preferred as DHCP is not supported. 3/ Mesh networks are not well supported.
start.error: An error has occurred, check the just entered IP-address.
start.add: Your settings are being saved now...
